Html:
While implementing the TypeScript 0.9 grammar into a parser generator, it seems there is a minor specification mistake about the extended grammar rule CallExpression (PDF page 118).

CallExpression: ( Modified )
â€¦
super ( ArgumentList_opt_ )
super . IdentifierName

In the last line of this rule, shouldn't we have instead this one?
super . IdentifierName ( ArgumentList_opt )_

Best.
